ModMetaData.name: Expanded Woodworking
ModMetaData.author: Adventurer, TedDraws, Aquiles
ModMetaData.description: Version 1.47 (20th January 2023). A revisited edition of the forked mod made by Mercenary, which already was an upgrade of Qwynn's Expanded Woodworking. Each tree type now produces a unique wood specific to that tree. These new wood types can be converted into lumber and, like the base game metals, can be used to construct various furnitures, buildings, and other objects which are designated as 'Woody' in their stuff category. Supports any starting scenario through using the crafting spot to make lumber. NEW! Polluted trees now produce rotten wood.
